quote: Perhaps it's good for one to suffer. Can an artist do anything if he's happy? Would he ever want to do anything? What is art, after all, but a protest against the horrible inclemency of life?
quote_letters: PERHAPS ITS GOOD FOR ONE TO SUFFER CAN AN ARTIST DO ANYTHING IF HES HAPPY WOULD HE EVER WANT TO DO ANYTHING WHAT IS ART AFTER ALL BUT A PROTEST AGAINST THE HORRIBLE INCLEMENCY OF LIFE
